betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The nice thing about this new technology is that it can be used to directly boost the production rates of more mythic technology.
Or is it recursive technology? I really have to come up with a coherent definition. Not fully knowing what type of magic is what, though, does not make things easy.
To be fair, what we now call 'electricity' wasn't always called that, ancient egyptians, who had observed the phenomena in electric fish, called it the 'thunder of the Nile', so I think I can cut myself some slack...
